definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: She told me some rigmarole or other about having lost her keys .
sentences.chinese: 她向我拉拉雜雜說了一大套關於丟失鑰匙的事。

sentences.english: The article is very badly organized.
The politician drew out his speech to almost two hours.
sentences.chinese: 拉拉雜雜講了近兩個小時。

definition: postal kiosk/(old) rest shelter for couriers

lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner

to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
